p: We investigated 21 SNPs as associated factors in PD; however, the polymorphisms rs947211, rs356220, and rs2736990 were discarded from further analysis due to their pattern of linkage disequilibrium. The polymorphisms rs34778348 and rs33949390 in the LRRK2 gene were found to be monomorphic in our sample and were also discarded. Of the remaining 16 SNPs, a significant PD risk association was found for the allelic and genotype frequencies of the polymorphism rs1491942; all stated confidence intervals (CI) are 95%.
